Comment.Content: Thanks for your posting. I needed a clear example and with your information I got my Log4Net to use 1 connection string in the web.config. Great Job.
Comment.TargetTitle: Using the Connection String section for Log4Net and NHibernate
Comment.Author: Don Sabio
